Uniform.NAME: Uniform
Uniform.FLAVOR: It can be used not only to keep dirty stuff away, but also to carry weapons.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, obtain #b6 #yKnives.

PocketWatch.NAME: Pocket Watch
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you exhaust a card, draw one more card next turn.

StoneMask.NAME: Stone Mask
StoneMask.FLAVOR: You feel a sudden impulse to reject your humanity.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you kill a non-minion enemy, heal for #b2 HP and gain #b1 permanent Max HP.

MysterySword.NAME: Mystery Sword
MysterySword.FLAVOR: Found in the depth. Users must sacrifice themselves to wield this sword.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each turn deals double damage and has #yBacklash #b3.

PaperSwan.NAME: Paper Swan
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yBlight, you have #b50% chance to apply an additional #b1 #yBlight.

SplendidAttire.NAME: Splendid Attire
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rUniform. At the start of each combat, obtain #b12 #yKnives, gain #b1 #yStrength.

OldScarf.NAME: Old Scarf
OldScarf.FLAVOR: It is said that this is a family heirloom.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger a #yVision effect, draw a card.

Pan.NAME: Pan
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b2 #yBlight to ALL enemies.

RomanBracelet.NAME: Roman Bracelet
RomanBracelet.FLAVOR: Only few people may release its true potential.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, put #b2 #yTemporal #yEssence in your draw pile.
